title: Clear Noon, Moderate-Speed City Driving with Ego Vehicle Almost Stopped
caption: Ego vehicle driving slowly in a busy city street with other cars and pedestrians.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is approaching an intersection, and the traffic light is green. The driver is being cautious and following the speed limit to ensure safety.
